contentrichtext.text: '''CDU''' as a [[Three-letter acronym|three-letter abbreviation]] can refer to: == Organizations == *[[Country Development Unit]], a non-governmental organization in Afghanistan *[[CentrumDemokraternes Ungdom]], a youth organization in Denmark === Political parties === *[[Cameroon Democratic Union]], a political party in Cameroon *[[Centro Democrático Unido]], a political party in El Salvador *[[Christian Democratic Union (Germany)]], a German political party *[[Christian Democratic Union (East Germany)]], a defunct political party *[[Christian Democratic Union (Netherlands)]], a minor political party in the Netherlands between World War I and World War II *[[Christian Democratic Union (Ukraine)]], a political party in Ukraine *[[Cristiani Democratici Uniti]], a former Italian political party *[[Coligação Democrática Unitária]], a leftist political coalition in Portugal *[[Croatian Democratic Union]], a conservative political party in Croatia led by Jadranka Kosor == Technology == * Cash Dispenser Unit, which could be part of a [[Teller assist unit]] or an [[Automated teller machine]] *[[Coolant Distribution Unit]], used for water cooling in data centers *[[Control Display Unit]], a device used in remote operated gasfields *[[Flight management system|Control Display Unit]], a device used to access an aircraft Flight Management Computer *[[Counter Display Unit]], a retail display unit normally sited on a shop counter to encourage consumer impulse purchases * Critical Dimension Uniformity, a semiconductor lithography quality measure * Crude Distillation Unit, a distillation column, present in every crude oil refinery. The function of a CDU is to separate the crude oil into its "fractions". == Education == *[[Catholic Distance University]], a worldwide Catholic university based in Hamilton, Virginia, U.S offering theological instruction and degrees via Internet *[[Cebu Doctors' University]], a medical university in the Philippines *[[Charles Darwin University]], a university in Darwin, Australia *[[Charles R. Drew University of Medicine and Science]], a university in Willowbrook, California == Other == *[[Clinical Decisions Unit]], a short-stay department in some hospitals *[[Cam and Dursley railway station]], a station in Gloucestershire, England with code CDU {{Disambiguation}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cdu}}
